department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
description: The Charlottetown Laboratory is currently accepting bids for the removal and installation of new breeching for the facilities emergency power diesel generator. The contractor must perform and complete the work by March 31, 2024.
full_summary:
=====================================

**Tender Title**: Diesel Generator Breeching Replacement
**Reference Number**: CB-5253-91995670
**Amendment Number**: 4
**Solicitation Number**: A0123D (2023-00454)

**Tender Details**
-----------------

*   **Publication Date**: May 05, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date**: June 16, 2023 @ 2:00 PM EDT
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: June 26, 2023
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2024
*   **Tender Status**: Expiration Date has passed.
*   **Country**: Canada
*   **Region**: Prince Edward Island, Charlottetown
*   **Province/State**: Ontario, None

**Procurement Method**
--------------------

*   **Procurement Category**: CNST
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

**Tender Description**
---------------------

The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) is inviting tenders for the removal and installation of new breeching for the facilities emergency power diesel generator at the Charlottetown Laboratory. 

**Bidder Requirements**
----------------------

*   The Contractor must complete the work by March 31, 2024.
*   A mandatory site visit will take place on May 16, 2023, at 10:00 a.m. (Prince Edward Island time). Interested bidders shall meet at the Charlottetown Laboratory (93 Mount Edward Road, Charlottetown, PE C1A 5T1) at the front entrance.
*   Bids must be submitted only to the Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) Bid Receiving by the specified date, time, and location as indicated on page 1 of the bid solicitation.

**Trade Agreements**
-------------------

*   This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Attachments**
--------------

*   Invitation to Tender: [Download](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5253/a0123d---invitation-to-tender.pdf)
*   Amendment 1: [Download](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5253/a0123d---addendum-1_0.pdf)
